detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>11</mn>
  <msqrt>
    <mn>15</mn>
  </msqrt>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">11\sqrt {15}</annotation></semantics></math>. The rational part is 11, and the irrational part is <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <msqrt>
    <mn>15</mn>
  </msqrt>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\sqrt {15}</annotation></semantics></math>.
